Title: Chasing Liberty
Actors: Mandy Moore, Stark Sands, Tony Jayawardena, Jeremy Piven
Plot: Anna wants to be like other girls her age (18): date a guy etc. but she's the US president's daughter and always guarded. In Prague he breaks his promise of only 2 agents following her to a concert and she runs away with Ben to see Europe.
Language: English, French, German, Hebrew, Italian, Spanish
